casebody.data:
PURA VIDA MANAGEMENT CORP., Daniel J. Culliton and Ashley Culliton, Plaintiffs,
v.
ADIO MANAGEMENT COMPANY, INC., Jeffrey G. Hedges, Jennifer Hedges, Hedges Family Chiropractic, P.A., Mary Ingram, Professional Business Cent$, LLC, Superior Healthcare Physical Medicine, PC, and Dr. Venus Pitts, Defendants. No. COA17-905 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 21, 2018

VACATED.
